title: TCW Executive Director Performance Review
description: Performance review for the Executive Director covering January - June 2025
instructions:
This review covers the performance period from January - June 2025. Results and comments will be viewed in aggregate by role (staff / board / ED).

For reference, the Executive Director job description summary:

The Executive Director will be responsible for strategic planning, operational management, community outreach, and volunteer coordination and will work closely with the Board of Directors to ensure the financial health and sustainability of the organization while enhancing its programs and services. This role requires a hands-on leader who is both a strategic thinker and a practical manager, capable of inspiring staff, volunteers, and community partners.
welcome_message: Thank you for participating in the TCW Executive Director Performance Review. Your thoughtful feedback is essential for supporting the ED's continued growth and success.
closing_message: Thank you for completing the Executive Director Performance Review. Your feedback has been submitted successfully and will be reviewed in aggregate with other responses. We appreciate your time and thoughtful input in supporting TCW's leadership development.

settings.confidentialityNotice: All responses are confidential and will be aggregated by respondent category (Staff, Board, ED). Individual responses will not be attributed to specific reviewers. Results will be shared with the Board of Directors and the Executive Director in summary form only.
